paragraph: Sona Shahgeldyan  (Armenian: Սոնա Շահգելդյան, born on November 18, 1986), is an Armenian singer and actress. Her first video clip was released in 2007. She is known for her roles as Sona on Domino (Armenian TV series), Ripo on North-South. She won the 2010 edition of New Wave.
2008 – "Menq Miasin enq" (We are together, featuring with Arsen Grigoryan)
2012 – "Haskacel em" (I've understood, featuring with Arsen Hayrapetyan)
